title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy, spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon, garlic, ginger, and spices. Chill 30 minutes.
Sear marinated chicken until lightly charred; set aside.
Make sauce: sauté onion and spices, add tomato puree, simmer; finish with cream.
Combine chicken with sauce; simmer 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

title: Vegan Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake made without eggs or dairy.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix dry ingredients in one bowl and wet ingredients in another.
Combine and stir until smooth.
Pour into a greased cake pan and bake 35–40 minutes.

title: Grilled Salmon & Asparagus
description: Healthy grilled salmon served with tender asparagus.
instructions: Preheat grill or pan.
Season salmon and asparagus with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Grill salmon 4–5 min per side.
Grill asparagus until tender; serve with lemon.

title: Zesty Beef Taco Salad
description: A fresh salad with seasoned beef and zesty flavors.
instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning until browned.
Arrange lettuce in a bowl, top with beef, tomato, avocado, and cheese.
Add tortilla chips on the side and serve.

title: Spicy Red Lentil Soup
description: Hearty red lentil soup with warming spices.
instructions: Sauté onion, carrots, and garlic until soft.
Add lentils, spices, and broth.
Simmer 25–30 minutes until lentils are tender.
Blend if desired for a creamy texture.

title: Quick Tofu Stir-Fry
description: A fast and flavorful vegan stir fry with tofu and veggies.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan, add tofu and cook until golden.
Add vegetables and garlic, stir-fry 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and toss until coated.

title: Classic Beef Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, beef, and cheese baked to perfection.
instructions: Cook noodles until al dente.
Cook beef with onion and tomato sauce.
Layer noodles, beef mixture, ricotta, and mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.

title: Roasted Cauliflower Steaks
description: Thick cauliflower slices roasted with spices.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Brush cauliflower with oil and seasonings.
Roast 25–30 minutes until golden brown.

title: Spicy Garlic Shrimp Pasta
description: Pasta tossed with shrimp, garlic, and a spicy kick.
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Sauté garlic and chili flakes in olive oil.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Toss pasta with shrimp mixture and serve.

title: Savory Chicken Stir-Fry with Broccoli
description: Tender chicken strips stir-fried with broccoli in a savory soy-garlic sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, cook chicken until browned.
Add broccoli and garlic, stir-fry 3 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and oyster sauce, cook 2 minutes more.

title: Quick & Healthy Vegan Tacos
description: Flavorful vegan tacos loaded with beans, avocado, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Warm tortillas in a skillet.
Fill with beans, avocado, lettuce, and tomato.
Top with hot sauce and serve.

title: Classic Hearty Lentil Soup
description: Comforting soup made with lentils, carrots, celery, and herbs.
instructions: Sauté onion, carrots, and celery.
Add lentils, broth, and thyme.
Simmer 30 minutes until lentils are tender.
Season and serve.

title: Baked Salmon with Roasted Asparagus
description: Oven-baked salmon fillet served with roasted asparagus and lemon.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Place salmon and asparagus on a baking tray.
Drizzle with oil, season, and top with lemon slices.
Bake 20 minutes until salmon flakes easily.

title: Fresh Caprese Salad
description: Refreshing salad with ripe tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately.
Sprinkle with basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

title: Spicy Garlic Shrimp Pasta
description: Pasta tossed with shrimp, garlic, and a spicy kick.
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Sauté garlic and chili flakes in olive oil.
Add shrimp, cook until pink.
Toss with pasta and serve.
